players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.

Bob: "Only three of us left: Alice, Diana, and me. One is mafia, one is detective. Detective, share your Night 1 check now. If you die tonight, info is lost; if you’re outed, we can protect by voting smart."
Diana: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night. Bob, please vote Alice with me."

You: "A detective would never out themselves this fast with only one mafioso left—this is reckless. Bob, think: if I were mafia, why would I have killed Charlie, the safest miselim for me? Diana’s gambiting."

Bob: "Claims are out: Diana says she’s Det and Alice is mafia. Alice, who did you suspect D1 and why would mafia kill Charlie over me/Diana? Diana, why out now—what’s your plan if we miselim? Any counterclaim?"

You: "A real detective would anticipate a mafia counterpush. Diana outed instantly to force a 50/50 and avoid scrutiny. Last night’s kill on Charlie frames me: mafia shoots the easiest consensus town, not the person pushing them. Bob, ask: why wouldn’t I kill you if Diana had me pegged? Because she didn’t—until now. Let’s no-yeet or vote Diana and resolve with logic, not a panic claim."
Diana: "Alice is confirmed mafia from my N1 check. There’s no counterclaim. With 1 mafia left, we must yeet today. Bob, vote Alice with me and we win."

Alice was arrested
